TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Rekat, title = Rekat, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rekat} }

S.FORM: Rekat Itiniay i Luye Cen no Taitung ko Rekat a niyaro', 127 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 398 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 77% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 306 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 23% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 92 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis73%, Bunun1%, Paiwan1%, Puyuma1%, roma2%.

Rekat Itiniay i Loye Cen no Taitong ko Rekat a niyaro', 127 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 398 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 77% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 306 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 23% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 92 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis73%, Bonon1%, Paiwan1%, Poyoma1%, roma2%.
